text:
Almost crashing into the back of a car while driving along the á
motorway on my motorcycle.
When my girlfriend of two years told me it was all over.

A person I really like left for overseas for a few months, I had á
hoped to go out with her soon.

I deliberately avoided a person who I wanted to hurt, and who á
wanted to talk to me.

When I received my U.E. accredited as I was totally unexpecting á
it and I was so happy.

I went to see a movie and I went with a friend, it was really á
frightening and it made me stop and think about the world around á
me and what it is really like out there. I was frightened all á
that night.

When my flatmate put me down because she "thought" she was better á
than me, or she felt she was.

When a very close friend of mine went into hospital for a major á
operation and I couldn't see her for a while as I was not a á
relative she had no relatives in N.Z.

One of my very good friends came to me for advice as her á
boyfriend had been hitting her and beating her quite harmfully.
I received an assignment back, and got an A+ grading.

I was walking home one night (after getting a bus to my town) á
when I was confronted by a group of males (about 6), they would á
not let me pass - they made comments etc. - I crossed the road á
and hurried home.

I lent a text-book to a person I did not know very well, they á
lost the text-book and gave me no compensation.

At the beginning of the year I moved to a new city - I felt sad á
as I had to leave many friends and family members behind.

I read a newspaper article about dogs being stolen in order to á
use them for fighting purposes.

Getting University Entrance accredited and arriving home from á
boarding school on accrediting leave.

Thinking that I had been seen smoking at school by a teacher - á
waiting to be summoned to the headmaster's office.

When my mother rejected my boyfriend and made unfair judgements á
on him.

At my grandfather's funeral - My grandparents virtually raised me á
as my mother was a solo-parent and had to work.
Watching a TV documentary on seal clubbing.
The birth of my first child.

A large german shepherd dog ran and barked at me (he didn't bite á
fortunately).

Most recently when the chairman at the New Zeeland Rugby Union á
announced that the All Blacks' would accept the invitation of á
South Africa to play rugby in that country.

When I was told a friend's baby had been born with only partial á
sight. This was her first child and she was not young (the mother á
that is).

When I first saw the state of a cafeteria in the grounds of the á
university. Due to students own lack of concern for the á
environment in which they eat and drink. Rubbish and spilled tea á
and coffee left everywhere.

I was biking with my boyfriend, the sun shining after a long á
period of bad beather, afterwards we spent the evening and night á
together.

I was hitchhiking and was picked up by a stranger he drove into á
the woods and wanted to make love with me, I refused and escaped á
from the car. When walking in the wood and hearing the car I was á
afraid.

In a discussion the leader wanted to stop because she was of the á
opinion that we were not involved and she misjudged our reactions á
as negative. We however only posed several questions which she á
couldn't answer.

When my grandmother died. She stayed with us until I had the age á
of 10. When she died I was 13 and I remember the moment after the á
funeral: I sat on the table and cried.
When I heard about the disaster in Bophal (India).
When passing the final examinations for social worker.

Sleeping alone in a tent, while hearing several noises such as á
rustling etc, I am afraid that there are people who are up to no á
good.

A man kept a seat taken by putting his coat on it after a while á
the chair was still empty, I asked him if I could use the chair, á
he didn't agree for the chair was for his coat.
When the relationship with my girlfriend broke up.

A piece of work was marked as bad by the teachers I and some á
fellow students didn't agree with their vague criticism. I felt á
myself taken in by the teachers and felt disgust.

A friend came to tell me that her father invited me to go on á
holiday with them in Benidorm otherwise I could not afford to go á
on holiday.

At the age of 12 years I always had to take care of my little á
brother and sister I never could sleep then. I always imagined á
creepy men sneaking into our house.

The landlord had selected a new lodger on her own, while we used á
to do that it was not what she had done, but how she did it that á
made me angry.

It was a complex situation concerning a relationship with a á
boyfriend, I had broken the relationship for some reasons. á
Meanwhile, as I felt it, I had most sorrow.

At the moment when I heard the result of an examination and it á
proved that I succeeded the second year of my study.

I have a fobic anxiety for elevators. This anxiety is worst at á
the moment when the doors have to open. I have it often in the á
elevator at our university.

When someone accuses me without reason and is not willing to á
listen to me.
My boyfriend decided to make an end to our relationship.

A person I know who tells lies and so pretending to be better á
than she is.

I can't give one description here. I often feel joyful when I á
have done things good in relation to other people especially when á
my friend says he loves me and I also tell him that I love him.

I was afraid when my first boyfriend threatened to make an end to á
our relationship because he didn't love me enough while I loved á
him very much.

A good friend deceived me. Because of that little quarrel our á
relationship finished, mainly because she was not honest. I was á
very angry about that.
I was very sad when my first boyfriend finished our relationship.

I was once raped (one year ago) by a man who was a lot older than á
me and whom I just met. Maybe it wasn't rape but the man wanted á
more than I wanted to give him since there were other people in á
vicinity.
When my boyfriend came back after being away for 10 days.
When I was sitting in a car next to a man who was masturbating.

When my mother told things to my sister, which I told my mother á
in confindence.

Tonight in bed when I realised how bad my relationship with my á
friend was.

When I was in Eindhoven on an Exhibition of Hernan Nitsche, who á
made paintings with real blood. There were also photographs about á
the killing of cows.

When I was making music together with my friend. It sounded very á
good and we were very satisfied.

When my cat ran under a car and came home wounded. He could á
hardly walk. I didn't dare to go to a veterinarian because I was á
afraid he would kill him.

I had to unscrew something on my car. I didn't succeed after two á
afternoons of trying. A feeling of anger built up itself.

Losing my girlfriend who made an end to our relationship. By this á
I lost an important source of support, certainty and joyful á
moments. I cried very intensly when that happened.

A few days ago I saw two dandy girls of my age. I disliked their á
clothes and their way of doing.

At an important moment in a volleyball game we made a point and á
by this we won a set from a much stronger competitor.

When I went out with my dog in a forest late at night when we á
were on a camping.

I had an appointment with someone at a certain time. The other á
person didn't appear.

When I entered the operation theatre and underwent a difficult á
operation.

When my friends left without waiting for me, after we had arranged á
to go out together.
When they gave away my dog to other people without my knowledge.
When I had to eat scraps from a dust-bin, because of a bet.

When the Real Madrid team of basket ball qualified for the final á
of the Europe Cup at Athens.
On the scenic railway at the fairground.
At having an argument with a stranger, in the street.
[ The same as in guilt.]
When I entered a toilet in a bar and it stank.
The day I finished my military service.

When I was a child, one day, I was going home late at night and I á
did not notice an uncovered man hole and fell in it.  I was in there for á
several minutes.
One day, when I was a child, my grandmother shut me up in a room.
The day I left my first girlfriend.

One day I was in the countryside with several friends, and we á
began to eat figs, after we were all full we noticed that all the á
figs were full of worms.
When I won the first prize in a cross country race.

I found myself involved in a fight in which a person died and I á
had to intervene with some risk.

An argument among friends in which my opinions on the way to á
spend spare time were disapproved.
I was forced to leave an unforgettable friend.

I saw the gare of a prison.  This gare and the building were in á
deplorable condition and were full of rubbish.
When I passed the last exam, which I had doudts about.
Before I had a tooth pulled out.  I was very upset and ill.

When the Real Madrid football team lost against the inter in the á
U.E.F.A cup.

When my dog died.  I had reared it for nearly three years.  It á
had been ill for several days and had not eaten anything.  One á
morning I found it dead.

On a trip to Santander a child sitting beside me fell ill and á
started to vomit, seeing this made me feel very bad.

When I was back home after a long time, meeting beloved people á
and close friends.

When I heard about the treatment of a friend in jail. Really á
inhuman. I never realised that such things also happen in the á
Netherlands.

When on holiday in Greece I called my best friend, she told me á
she passed the examinations and that she had been admitted to the á
study for speech therapy.

Together with a little brother I biked on a lonely road in the á
Polder. Then we were annoyed by a boy on a motorbike: he á
took over, stopped, took over, etc. Then we saw he had something á
in his hand, we turned until we came across a man, who á
accompanied us.

We lived with 3 persons in the loft of a house. It often occurred á
that other persons again and again climbed the stairs with much á
noise. When I was studying I couldn't concentrate and got angry.

I partly colored my hair black. My mother didn't like it and á
reproached me to be a "subversive element". Later on she stated á
that this was due to my friends. As I see it, this all resulted á
from colouring my hair.

I was shopping in Utrecht with friends, we also ate some chips á
and snacks in a snackbar, then we saw a shabby fellow. He took a á
cold half eaten croquette (a snack) from a rubbish bin and eat á
it.

It appeared that I gave correct answers to all questions during á
an examination of personality while I thought I performed very á
badly. Even now, I don't know how I managed it.

My father was very angry with me, and I locked me up in the á
shower. Then my father knocked his fist through the door, I was á
scared to death.

My sister borrowed some LP records for a party. She had left them á
in the car on curatao. Due to the heat they were crooked, so I á
couldn't play them again.

When my grandmother died, her life was heavy and her last hours á
were terrible.

When I watched TV and saw a performance of "Prince" (a popidol). á
Disgusting he'd better be a stallion.

Unofficially I was informed about my results of the final á
examination of the secondary school. A teacher wrote them up for á
me. When I went outside, I started crying with joy.

I am thinking about death, the eternal of it, the unknown, the á
sense of being here. Often, laying in bed in the dark and quiet, á
the fear makes me feel dizzy.

If they force me to eat something I don't like. For example, my á
parents always twaddle and whine, when I don't eat all the food.

I had to leave Den Helder and all friends and acquaintences, á
after having spend two weeks there with my friends.

Being on view in a meat-factory. Pigs being cut open, pigs being á
suspended from nods, blood everywhere, decompsition.

When the parents of my girlfriend gave permission to spend our á
holiday together.

When the relationship with my first girlfriend broke up and I á
realized it too late.

Someone who always took care for the key of the sportshall stayed á
away without letting us know. Next time he did as if nothing had á
happened.
When my last relation broke up.

When working in a chemical laundry, I saw rats and maggots in the á
washing.
When I passed the driving test (on the second try).

I was walking in the wood at night with my boyfriend. Very á
romantic. Suddenly I heard a car driving very slowly with the á
lights out, it looked as if they were looking for something.

I am a teacher in arts and crafts (boys from 15-16 years). for á
them it is obligatory and they dislike it. They tease me. When one of á
them cut up some material I flared up.

My sister was in coma for 3 months (due to a train accident). Now á
her brainfunctions are disturbed. She will never be able to walk á
and she can hardly talk.

I lived together with my boyfriend. One night he stayed away and á
next day he told me that he had chat up with another girl.

When I started a relation with a girl, with whom I have fallen in á
love already some time ago.

Once sitting in the cinema, I became very anxious (watching a á
"cold" film). I do not know the reason.

I work for a journal. Once the lay-out came to nothing, due to á
thoughtlessness of some colleagues.

My mother was stuck by an apoplectic fit, was hemi-paralyzed and á
suffered an aphasia.

Each time I am confronted with reports about repression and á
torture.

I felt very happy when I heard I had passed the examination to á
move up to the second year course.

On a holiday in France I made a walk in the woods all alone and á
very relaxed. Then a motorbike took me over and I saw the man á
watching all the time. Suddenly the man stood behing me and I ran á
away fast.

I invited two friends. We should go out together. Those two girls á
kept talking about boys, chatting up etc. I bacame sick of it.

I felt very sad when my boyfriend wanted to break our á
relationship. Our relationship lasted two years, we shared á
everything and all this was finished.

I broke an egg, with which there was something wrong, into a á
little cup. There was a thick white "wad" in it. I tried to take á
it out and throw it in the sink.

I liked to see off my aunt (from Zaire) to the airport. That á
appeared to be impossible because I had to go to school. For long á
time I wasn't sure if I could accompany her. Two days before the á
departure they told me I was allowed to miss school.

I went to the ballet lessons with a little friend in the dark. On á
a very quiet place a boy approached us from behind and asked at á
what time the lesson would be finished. I gave him an avoiding á
answer, he took me up and wanted to run away with me.

I was sleeping nicely until in the middle of the night when I became á
awake because a friend called me for some (in my opinion) á
nonsens reason.

My boyfriend with whom I had a longlasting relationship, fell in á
love with another girl, then he asked me something which implied á
that he loved that girl more than he loved me.

On school, during a fancy fair, there was a stand of amnesty á
international. There I read (for the first time) a description of á
the tortures of a woman, what they did to her.

When I had to undergo the final examination of secondary school, á
I lived together with a girlfriend. We both were afraid to fail, á
but it appeard that we both had passed.

When I had left my home, my father, under false pretences, got me á
in his car and drove home where we were all alone. He was seethed á
with rage because I withrew from his authority. He hit me, kicked á
me and threatened me.

When my father took away my cherised diaries to burn them (I was á
also very sad) "Oh, how I hated him".

I felt very sad when I left home because I could not stand it any á
longer. I do not regret it, but I missed my little sister very á
much (and she missed me). These feelings wear off over time.

A friend and a girlfriend went to Rome for 10 days with their á
class. When they were back home I heard people tell "strange" á
stories about my friend and that girlfriend.
Passing my driver's examination (after two failures).

When I was six years old we were on holiday in France. There was á
very heavy weather then.

A quarrel with my mother because I thought she said very á
unreasonable things about me, that hit me strongly.

The disease and subsequent death of a close acquaintance. Sadness á
was accompanied with feelings of powerlessness (I also á
experienced sadness in the situation described under guilt).

When I take a look into a slaughter-house and when listening to á
stories about torturing people or animals.

When a friend of mine had her period, while thinking she was á
pregnant.
Fear to come and live in Nijmegen.
When the coach of our team degraded me to the second team.
When a friend died.

When I saw a documentary film about World War II (about Hitler á
and his adepts).

Spending the nitht with close friends, after being away (out of á
Nijmegen) for a while.

Just before I started my study I had to move, I was very afraid á
to be left alone and that I could not manage it.

When anybody wants to make me feel guilty. For example: I should á
do something for my mother, but things didn't go as she hoped. á
Then she threatens: I'll do it myself.

When a close friend took leave of me, because she went to Israel á
for one year.

I wanted to take something from under my bed. While doing this I á
felt a dead bird laying under my bed.

A fellow player, quite unexpectedly, scores a goal, which means a á
draw.

In college, I started a discussion with the teacher referring to á
a question I posed. I felt very unsure and I was afraid to fail.

While playing indoor-hockey, there always is an older man who á
frequently and intentionally plays the ball out of the field. In á
my opinion this is very childish, because we play for fun only.

I was together with my family one night, a few days after my á
father had died, during that conversation I expressed my á
displeasure because nobody understands me.

Salo, a movie film by Pasolini. People were misused and tortured á
for the fun of a few elder Italian authorities, during World War á
II.

When my boyfriend once again told me that he loved me after a á
period in which he felt very depressive.

I was walking alone in the street late at night (2.30 am). It was á
very quiet. Then a man approached me and said "Hello".
When, late at night, I discovered that they had stolen my bike.

When a friend, after being free of drugs for half a year, started á
using them again.á
In a disco, there was a dirty little chap who punched my bottom.

When a friend who comes visiting me unexpectedly asks for coffee á
and I refuse to give him this.

Watching a football game. This remindes me of the time when my á
father was still alive and when we watched football games on TV á
together.
Seeing someone who has bleeding nose.
When I got a good grade for an exam in statistics.

One night at three o'clock I was followed by a cardriver, who á
tried to molest me.

My father promised me a bicycle for my birthday. Just before my á
birthday he forgot he promised this to me.
A younger brother of a good friend of mine died (asthma).

I read a book about torture. The book described exactly how the á
torturing was done.
I had a very pleasant conversation with one of my friends.

I had a dream about my fiancTe leaving me and making an end to á
our relation.
My bicycle was demolished.

During the funeral of my grandmother, when I saw my mother and á
other family members crying.

A fellow student who seemed very nice later on proved to be a á
slimy fellow towards a professor.

This week I was phoned by an old friend with whom I lost contact á
a few years ago.
I was raped by a friend.

Last year I had a friend visiting me for several days. The only á
thing he did was sleeping, drinking, taking pills and thinking á
only about himself.

My girlfriend does practice and therefore leaves me alone at á
night and in the weekend. In addition, she is very busy doing á
several things. So we don't see each other often.

My father suddenly fell ill. He stayed for 3 months in the á
hospital: the last month on intensive care of the Academic á
Hospital, then he died.

Bisshop Ter Schure intoduced himself on TV to the Dutch Nation. á
He spoke as if he was God himself, and didn't discuss the way he á
had achieved this position.

I thought that someone was angry with me but, by hindsight, that á
didn't appear to be the case, he even liked me.

Once, late at night, I was biking home and overtook a man. He á
said to me "Hello darling" I was terrified and imagined the á
wildest scenes.

My parents thought that I didn't do my best to pass the final á
examination (secondary school). When I achieved a good grade they á
said nothing, but if I had had a bad grade they would have become á
very angry.

When I caused much pain and sorrow to my boyfriend by finishing á
our relationship.

When I read about or think about environmental pollution, the á
armor race, starvation, etc. Then one realizes that mankind is á
bad, most important is power and money, at the cost of nature and á
mankind.

A meeting and a conversation with a woman (somewhat elder than á
me) who considers me as her child (she also has one child of her á
own). Last two years I lived with her (no relationship).

As a child I suffered of nightmares. Even since than, I have á
never been so anxious and fearful.

When talking with my sister, she often ventilates prejudices, á
which my father also adheres.

I was in a hopeless situation in a dirty place. No study, no á
work, only loneliness.

It is very difficult to relate it to a certain event. I am á
familiar with the disgust of Sartre (la nausTe), a frequently á
occurring cause may be described as "the self-assured dullness".

When I passed the driving test already on the first try, although á
I felt more and more uncertain as the day came near.

When my father suffered with dizziness. He had to be á
hospitalized, because the physician didn't know what was wrong. á
Because his stools were black, I thought it could be cancer.

When I arranged our holiday in Paris, and my girlfriend raised á
criticisms all the time.

When it suddenly appeared that our dog was dangerously ill and á
probably would die. We had not expected this because he á
was always very healthy. Fortunately he survived because we, in turn, á
gave him medicines during the night.

When a girl in my class (on the secondary school) appeased the á
teacher, resulting in getting a higher grade. This occurred often á
with her.
Passing an examination, although I felt sure I had failed.

I lived in a student-house, where you shared the lavatory and á
shower with a fellow student. the shower cubicle formed the á
connection between both appartments. My neighbour very often was á
drunk and aggressive. One night, I was afraid that he would enter á
my room.

I suffer from a disease of my muscles. Therefore, I am only able á
to attend lectures for half a day. So, sometimes I miss á
obligatory lectures. However, the teachers do not take into á
account my disease, and punish me with detention work, resulting in á
an overload.

I suffer form a disease of my muscles. However, I cannot talk á
about it and my feelings, the consequence with my parents. They á
try to repress it.

Grandfather lives in a home for the elderly. He always looks á
forward to visits. On his birthday (by coincidence it was on á
"Mummy's day") however, nobody went to see him. Is the own family á
more important than grandfather ?
When armed robbers broke into our house at night.

When a pick-pocket robbed me of my money (K20) while I  was á
buying bathing soap.
When I failed the grade seven examination.

When my friend who was drunk insulted me in public for no reason at á
all.
The day I learnt that I had been admitted to the university.

When I had gone for a boxing tournament which ended at 2 o'clock á
in the morning.  I was alone on my way back, and I could hear the á
barking of the dogs, the nocturnal animals and the sound of my     á
own footsteps.  There had been a rumour  circulating that there á
were ghosts in that area.

In 1983 a sadist provoked my sister in my presence.  He tried á
to force my sister into accompanying him to his place, but my á
sister did not agree and so she was kicked and she fell down.  á
There was a fight.

When my father passed away in 1978.  I was left alone with my á
mother who was very sick so I had to go and live with my aunt, who á
is very short tempered, till my mother was discharged from the á
hospital.
When I learnt that my best friend had failed the exams.

"Boy, you have been admitted to the medicine school and your á
uncle is coming back fron Canada next week," my father told me á
and it was a happy moment.

I was in form five at the boarding school and my friends and I á
had gone drinknig beer in the nearby village.  And we were caught á
red handed there by a form master.
When my mother quarrelled with my aunt over me.

My elder brother had been expelled from college and he was so á
frustated that he attempted suicide - he drank bottle fragments.  á
I was very sad when I learnt this.

I found out accidentaly that while my uncle was away in Canada, my á
aunt had been bedding a young man on a regular basis.

I won the first prize at the science fair, the first of the kind á
at school and I was only in form II then.

A close relative of mine died in a serious car accident.  I was á
one of the first two people to see the corpse and I had to do it. á
 Before going in to see it I was afraid as it was the first time á
that I was seeing a corpse.

My younger brother destroyed and gave away some of the books that á
I had intended to keep for as long as possible.

When a close relative of mine passed away, it was the first time á
that someone so close to me had died.

A person whom I thought to be honest took and spend the little á
money that I had and I had no way of getting any money in the á
few following months.

My 21st birthday celebration, when I cut the cake and received á
the presents.

Before one of my final exams of the third year - natural á
sciences.

When some seniors tried to scold and insult some juniors on á
account of what the juniors were supposed to have said at á
secondary school.

When an uncle of mine, who was close to me, passed away after á
having had a stroke, before his first daughter could be named.
When my sister's boyfriend accused her of having been sleeping around.
My fiancT left me for my best friend.
People who discriminate other people disgust me.
A recurrent lovesickness.
I was sexually assaulted one night by a stranger.

Meddlesomeness of my mother about the way I live. She thinks I am á
to free in my behavior for instance when a boyfriend stays the á
night.
The dying of a close member of the family.
Seeing maltreated, dead animals.
When I passed a very important exam.

When a man rang the doorbell and wanted to enter the house with á
violence. I was alone at home that moment.

A friend came to visit me late one night. He promised to stay á
only a quarter of an hour, but he stayed 5 hours !! He didn't á
leave and I was very angry.

I had to terminate a training because I wasn't suited for it. I á
was very sad about this, because I very much wanted to finish á
that training.

During my birthday party a friend drank too much alcohol. So much á
that he had to throw up. Worst of all was that he couldn't leave á
my friend alone and that he was molesting her.
I went to visit friends and it was very companionable.

I wanted to get in contact with a girl I loved, but I was afraid á
she would refuse me.

During military service a superior reproached me unjustly. This á
led to friction in a lot of situations.

Disappointed love. The girl made an end to our relationship while á
I thought she was in love with me.

During military service I heard the story of someone who tried to á
commit suicide and as a result of this got a week custody.

Sitting alone in a quiet room concentrating on things happening á
around me which pleases me.

Sitting alone in a quiet room, concetrating on things happening á
around you. Thoughts come into my mind which make me afraid.

When a teacher tells a story which isn't true. It only reflects á
his way of interpreting reality.

I have high expectations for my future but if I pursue the á
subject in this manner I will not attain this.

I heard a broadcasting programme about parapsychology. The people á
in this programme used very difficult words which I couldn't á
understand. They acted exaggerated without showing any feeling.

My sister and brother in law returned from Sri Lanka where they á
adopted a child. I went to pick them up at the airport.

During a football game I made an offence towards an acquaintance. á
Later on this acquaintance also tackeled me and the game became á
very rude.

I work at a petrol station. When there is a foreigner who wants á
petrol my collegues treat him very impolite.

An uncle of mine who just retired, having worked hard all his á
life, got a cerebral hemorrhage.

A student who lives in the same house where I live is an alcoholic. He á
tries to manipulate other people with his money when he has drunk á
too much.
When I got my drivers licence.

When I stayed alone in a house in Great Brittain and there was a á
lot of rumour in the newspaper about a murderer still being free.
The stories about the way my grandmother treated my mother.
When my mother was proved to suffer from a very serious disease.

The stories about my aunt who was beaten and humiliated by my á
uncle.

Every year during carnival I am very joyful I have an intense á
feeling of happiness then.

The only event I can remember is having a nightmare when I was á
very young (3 years old) I dreamt about a machine which was going á
to crush me.

I am usually angry at myself. This happens often. For instace á
when I want to pet without falling in love and it soon proves á
that I have fallen in love with him.

Losing a boyfriend for the second time to my friend. He fell in á
love with her. The same thing happened a few months earlier with á
another boyfriend.

There is a person whom I disgust. Evrey time I see her I get this á
terrible feeling I disgust her whole appearance.

When I came again in contact with a girl I liked very much. And á
most important she also liked me.
DO NOT REMEMBER.

After a hard day at the university I also had to make dinner that á
evening. It failed because of a frying pan which broke.
When my father had a cerebral hemorrhage.

A story I heard recently about a baby dying after sexual á
abuse.

When an old schoolfriend phoned me to arrange an appointment to á
talk about old memories. I hadn't seen him for 8 years.

Standing in a crowed shop or in a closed room with too much á
people in it. This gives me a fearful experience.

My older brother who gives me unwanted advices about problems in á
my relationship with my girlfriend.

My girlfriend left the house in which we lived together a few á
months ago. This made me very sad.

When my parents behave very "witty" towards me, they make insipid á
jokes about which they laugh. Or my mother who treats me like a á
little child.

Occurs frequently. A recent experience: when going out with many á
friends, nice music, after the examinations, I felt so happy I á
could have embraced everybody.

I lived alone in a repulsive area in the city of Rotterdam. I was á
annoyed, heard a lot of Burglary and assaults. Especially in the evening á
and the night I frequently felt anxious.
Being treated unfairly and being hurt by someone I love.

When I finished a relation after four years, leading to much á
sorrow for the other one and myself ("although it was the best á
solution").

Every time I meet a certain person. We cannot get on well á
together, we dislike each other.

I fell over head and ears in love with someone who appeared to be á
in love with me. it made me so happy that I could hardly sleep á
and eat for one week.

One night I had to bike home all alone after a party. Then I á
found out that I was pursued by a man in a car.

I had a quarrel with my father, because I was of the opinion that á
he decided in an authoritarian way which TV program we should á
watch. I became very angry and started throwing things through á
the room.

My boyfriend finished our relationship when I started studying á
psychology in Nijegen, because then we would not be able to meet á
frequently anymore.

A friend had a quarrel with the mother of her boyfriend because á
she and her friend decided to go and live together. She needed á
money for removal, then she made a great effort to reconcile.
I was called and invited to have a talk about a job I wanted to have.

Once late at night (around midnight) a person asked me to give á
him a lift. He suddenly tried to attack me but I could escape. á
After this he followed me for a little while.

There was a lot of irritation between me and a person who lives á
in the same house where I live. Suddenly it became too much for me and I á
accused him of several things.

The end of a relationship (after 4 years) by doing this I hurt á
the other person very much.

I saw a terrible accident in which the driver of a motor was á
thrown through the frontwindow of a car. His face was completely á
away.
When a friend of me came for an unexpected visit.
When I thought the house was on fire at night.

When I was at an official meeting I asked a question to a person. á
His response was not directed at me but at the chairman.
When the mother of a good friend of mine died.

A teacher was very blunt in his relation to a child so that the á
child was very upset when arriving at home.

After I saw my family and good friends back after staying one á
year in a foreign country.

When a good friend of mine behaved in a very cool manner to me á
for a very long time.

I was in the library of medical psychology and walked into the á
wrong direction. A man who came out of a room threated me very á
denigrating and I became very angry in a resisting manner.

A good friend of mine died. During the funeral I felt an intense á
feeling of sadness.

When an uncle of mine who is very ill started to cough wich á
sounded very dirty. (He can't help it of course).

When I go out with my friend with enough money and good sense to á
our favorite dancing.
When going out I am threatened regularly by two punk-girls.
A friend started to shout at me. He called me an old frump.

My relationship with a boyfriend was finished and I didn't á
succeed a years-course.

My father is someone I disgust. So when he comes close to me á
a feeling of disgust overwhelms me. When I stay a week-end at my á
parent's place I will remember it for long time.

When I made the winning goal during a very important football á
game.

A terrible cloud-burst started when we were camping in a tent on á
a great bald field.

Seeing for the first time pictures about the so called á
"treatment" of Jewish people in Nazi-Germany during World War II.

The death of my mother-in-law after a long sick-bed. at the á
moment of dying I was with her.

I was looking at a one-man show on television. He told very á
disgusting things so that I started to be disgusted with it. á
(Later on it proved that this was his intention).

When it appeared that I was not pregnant when I was several weeks á
overtime.

The same situation as with sadness. I was afraid about what my á
parents would further do to distroy my relationship.
Once again my parents distroyed a relationship.

I had this feeling when my parents distroyed a relationship with á
a boy because they thought he was bad and irresponsible.

After the accident which I described in SHAME. I came to myself á
and saw how terrible everything looked like. I disgusted myself á
and everything I saw.
A sudden end to the relationship with my first girlfriend.

I heard part of a conversation in which one talked very low about á
women.

I felt joy when I heard that I was accepted for the Free á
University in Driebergen.

When a good friend of me told me one evening that she didn't want á
to live anymore.

I felt anger when at the end of a telephone call, a good friend á
told me that she would go to travel next year with another good á
friend. We couldn't talk this out.

I was very sad when I had to leave persons with whom I had a very á
intense relationship I also had to leave the environment which á
was part of this.

I felt disgust after watching a picture on television about á
torturing political prisoners in India (this happened in the á
India of Indira Ghandi).

When my boyfriend and I went out for a dinner and subsequently á
went to his family. We had a very nice evening.

When I walk through streets late at night. This is because I and á
my friends were attacked one night without any reason for it.

When I got the feeling that I had to do all the housekeeping á
while my boyfriend didn't do anything. This happened in a period á
of exams when I had to study very hard.

When my best friend got a boyfriend. Because of this a á
relationship of ten years was finished abruptely.

I feel disgust when hearing or seeing other people being treated á
inhumanely. For example torturing in chili.
The day I heard that I passed the high school exam.

I was living in rooms in a very lonely, quiet neigbourhood. á
During the night it was very silent and this frightened me. The á
fact of being alone in that house frightened me.

We had to move to a very different city because the company where á
my father worked also moved to that place. It was very difficult á
for me to make new friends than.

A very close friend of mine died. I read it in the newspaper. I á
didn't know what to do and thought about it the whole day.

A girl who also hires a room in the house where I live always á
tries to make a quarrel with everyone available she disgusts me.

When Christmas holiday started, I felt very joyful when I á
finished my last exam.

I was raped once when I went through a dark alley at the back of á
our house. The man pushed me in the bushes. I fought back and á
succeeded to escape.

I was very angry at my father when he didn't give me as much á
money as my brother to use for studying. Once again my brother á
was better off then me.

When my gradmother died.  I felt very sad then ... The feeling á
started to be worse after a while.
When I ate a rotten apple.

My boyfriend was playing with my cat. He was playing games with her á
and telling nice things to her.

When I slept for the first time all alone in the house where I á
live now. A man phoned me at 2.00 am. He wanted something from á
me. I was afraid.

My boyfriend told me that I had very high demands towards him. In á
my opinion this was wrong.

I hadn't been at my parent's place for a long time. When I went to á
visit them I had high expectations, but when I was there it was á
very different from what I expected.

I read a story in the newspaper about butchers treating their á
animals very badly. They disgusted me.

During my high school time I succeeded to play a concert of á
Mozart on the piano when I gave my first performance I succeeded á
to play it very well.

When a car ran into me. The moment that I felt on the street I á
thought "This is my end, I am going to die".

When our cat was killed in a car-accident I was very angry at the á
driver of the car because he didn't take enough care.

There is a boy who I love very much. I asked him to have dinner á
with me, but he refused I don't know why he didn't go with me, á
but I felt very lonely.
I saw a dog who was eating excrements.

When I saw a good friend again after not having seen her for a á
long time.

When I slipped on a glazed frost road and a car almost ran into á
me.

When people without my permission pry in my belongings and take á
things out of it.

When I noticed that my parents were not in such a prosperity as á
most people in my surroundings.
Seeing a pornographic movie in which animals were used.

When I went to visit a friend in the hospital. She had to undergo á
an operation for rupture. I was glad to hear that the operation á
succeeded and that she was relieved of her pain.

I had an appointment with a good friend. He came 3 hours later á
than we agreed upon. During the last hour of waiting I was afraid á
something might had happened, because usally he is in time.

I worked together with another student on a computer-assignment. á
She didn't do her best and didn't prepare herself for it. She á
expected me to explain it to her.

I had a quarrel with a good friend about the fact that I didn't á
pay her a visit when she expected me to come. Hereafter I was á
very sad because it became a real quarrel.

I was hitch-hiking when a man stopped and gave me a lift to á
Nijmegen. During the ride he asked me whether I was in for fun. á
The man was fat and tatooed.

When I got the positive result of my examination to achieve the á
Bachelor Degree in Plychology.

When I was 12 years old I frequently was pursued by others and á
got sound thrashes.

My girlfriend one day went out and promised to be back at 6.00 pm á
however she first arrived at 10.00 pm, without a message (we had á
to go out that evening).
When my girlfriend decided to finish our relation.

When once again I drank too much and felt very rotten the morning á
after.
When the girl with whom I am in love smiles at me.

When biking and I felt very bad (problems with heart and á
respiration).

When a discussion resulted in an insult, which in my opinion, was á
not justified.

When I realized that it did not make much sense to start a á
relationship with a girl who was not very constructive to á
establish a firm relationship.
When I had to finish those big amounts of homework in time.
On my birthday when several good friends came to visit me.

I went to the apartment of my boyfriend and saw some people á
before his door. I thought that something had happened.

My father called me (behind my mother's back) and told me that my á
mother disapproved my behavior in the weekend. However, he didn't á
tell me the details and left me with unanswered questions.

I felt very lonely, was very dissatisfied with myself when I á
realised that I could feel very jealous of other women because á
of my boyfriend.

A scene in a film in which one man repressed another one. By á
concidence, their position was reversed. The other man was á
repressed in an identical way as he did before.

I felt joyful when my boyfriend met me at the station, while at á
first he had said that he would not do that.

I was very startled when, at night at 2.00 am, a boy approached á
me and yelled "I fuck you", then however he stopped and laughed at á
me.

When someone does not listen to me after having asked me to á
repeat what I said. This happened more than one time with the á
same person.
I felt very sad when I heard that a friend had committed suicide.

One night I saw a man being knocked down by two other men. The á
victim was kicked against his head.

For a few days I felt very miserable, distressed and listless, á
with crying fits. When this was over I felt very happy, although á
there was no special reason.

I was testing my new roller skates in the street, suddenly a dog á
ran barking in my direction, very threatening. I was very á
startled and terribly upset.

Out on a weekend with a group of people, everybody felt irritated á
because at night the music didn't stop in time. And at breakfast á
my boyfriend ran away because we didn't agree with him. I felt á
angry.

Recently I felt very sad without any reason. It lasted for a few á
days. There was nothing I liked in that period.

Someone told me a story of Amnesty International: a boy was á
killed and his head was put in the litter of his girlfriend. It á
looked as if she was pregnant, then she died. It is disgusting, I á
can hardly write it down.

When my boyfriend and I experience something nice or when we have á
made a nice walk together.

The weather is very bad (fog and slipperiness) the newcast á
reports many traffic accidents and my boyfriend is driving home á
and still has 60 kilometers to go.

Someone told me that he would stay at my home for one night. á
Therefore I made big efforts to make everything ok (food). One day á
before he cancelled the appointment because he had to go to á
church with his parents.

We had to take our cat to the vet for mercy killing (an á
injection).

When people are eating unsavoury (smacking, belching, speaking á
with food in their mouth, etc.).

One night I had a very good conversation with two friends. I then á
realized how worthy they were for me and how happy I was to á
have them as friends.
In the morning just before going to the dentist.

When a very close friend with whom I have a very intimate and á
bodily relationship (he had a girlfriend) started to avoid me and á
didn't want to talk to me any more.

When a good friend with whom I had an intimate relationship made á
clear that he didn't want to continue in the same way. He choose á
his girlfriend (also a friend of mine).

When I made love with someone who I didn't really love. Sometimes á
I even considered him unlikable.

My boyfriend suffered form ill health for some months, this week á
the physician told him that he was restored to health.

When going out in the weekend I have to bike 5 kilometers through á
lonely and dark polders, then I always have terrifying fantasies.

I made an appointment with a friend to drink coffee togehter. á
However, for the third time in that week she arrived an hour too á
late.

My dear hamster (called Hannes) died at the age of 2 and 1/2 years. á
His shape forced me to mercy killing (an injection).

I read a newspaper report that a little boy was forced to look á
while his sister was raped.

After the funeral of an acquaintance I felt very depressed. That á
feeling turned into joy when I heard that I had achieved a good á
grade for an examination.

I had to call someone and make an appointment for a conversation. á
I was very afraid to fail.

When, after having cleaned up the kitchen, two hours later I saw á
that there was a big mess. It irritated me very much.

One night I was called and told that the father of a close friend á
died. When I visited my friend at home and when attending the á
funeral I felt very sad.

I cannot remember exactly such a situation. But I know that á
once I went to a very dirty lavatory and that disgusted me.

When I found out that the girl, with whom I was in love, loved me á
too.

When my mother threatened me with thrushing me of the stairs, when á
I once more should make a comment.

When being made look a fool by the teacher in front of the class á
during a turn.

My mother unjustly became very angry with me and sent me to my á
room while my father explained that the way she saw things was á
not correct. I had done things with the best intentions.

My mother was very angry with my little sister and told her to á
put her hands on the table in order to beat her hands up. She á
forced by means of her power.

Once a week I work as a volunteer in a biologic garden. this work á
in the garden and the contact with other volunteers filled me á
with joy. They also gave me support after I failed passing my á
driver's test.

My friend and I planned to search for old documents and utensils á
in the cellar. It was very late at night when we arrived in the á
cellar. He indicated the place where the police (40 years ago) found á
two dead bodies. I got very scared when he told me this story.

When someone made me a compliment after an examination just at á
the moment I needed it. It was amicable, hearty and sincere.

When I went up the stairs in a high, dark house full of shadows, á
passed a door and had the feeling that someone or something was á
behind me, although I knew I was alone.

A friend told me it would be better for me not to be on familiar á
terms with another friend, although, in my opinion he had no á
reason to say such things. He only said so hoping that I á
would search support from him (that, however, was not necessary).

I had a good relationship with two friends. Once without reason, á
they clearly showed that they thought I was naive, dull and á
unable to take care for myself, while I expostulated that I could á
manage things.

When I see that some people remain cold and egoistic with regard á
to close friends, even in situations that those friends need á
them.

A few days ago, I hitch-hiked to Arnhems with a friend. á
Everything went well: they picked us up very quickly, the sun was á
shining, I was feeling free and, for the first time after long á
time, happy. I really had the feeling that I was living at full á
speed.

My grandmother several times has been struck by cerebral á
hemorrhages. Until now she recovered well each time, but there is á
always the threat to loose her.

I had made an appointment with three friends. We had to go out á
together. When I arrived at the place, the other persons weren't á
there. I became very angry because I thought they were gone á
without me. That, however, didn't appear to be the case.

I finished the relationship with my boyfriend, after having felt á
myself very unhappy for a long time.

A few days after I had finished the relationship with my á
boyfriend, we had a quarrel. Then he hit me. At that moment I á
found him disgusting.

A close relative of mine underwent a difficult operation, and everything á
turned out fine.

When I get into the tube or the train without paying for the á
ticket.

A class-mate urged me to carry out a particular protest along á
with him, and when the time came this fellow drew back while I á
had to face the situation.
When I failed the entrance exam to IMEC.
When I saw someone eating live worms.
When they told me that I had got a study grant.
When my father was saved from a severe work accident.

When I was a child I hid under the sheets out of fear of á
darkness.
When I first saw a person begging.
When my basket ball team lost the qualification at a final.
When I see rotten meat.

When I got to know that I had passed the university entrance á
exam.  I thought that I had done one of the exams badly.

When I was very young, one day, I was in the street with my á
father and brother.   While my father was talking to some á
friends, I saw a dog and began to pat it.  My father told me á
sharply to stop doing it because the dog had mange.  Then my á
brother told me that I would die and I could not stop crying á
after this.

We hitch hiked our way back from a town rather drunk.  We were á
dropped in another town which was unknown to us.  I needed to á
urinate, so I did it on a wall which turned out to belong to the á
military headquarters.  They arrested me and made me pay a fine á
of 500 pts.  We had to go home on foot (6 km) since it was too á
late for anyone to give us a lift.

I was to meet a girl in a discotheque.  She was very pretty and I á
was very happy.  But she did not turn up.  Thank God, there were á
some other friends there and I was able to have a more or less á
good time.

I had a class-mate who was rather stupid.  I did not like him á
but I respected him.  When he tried to talk to someone, they á
would not listen to him and I could not bear seeing this.

The day some friends of mine and I decided to go to Galicia on á
holiday.
Before an exam which I, finally did not take.
At home when they lost three pieces of my puzzle.
When I had an argument with a friend.
When I am dirty because I have not had a shower for a few days.

A friend of mine told me that I had passed the entrance exam to á
the university.
Before taking an exam.

My family told me to leave if I was not willing to accept the á
conditions they imposed on me.

A friend of mine called me when I was not at home.  I phoned her á
back to know what she wanted and she told me that she had dialled á
the wrong number.
I had to change a baby's clothes for the first time.
When my brother was born.

When I almost fell down from some rocks because I had been acting á
foolishly and playing dangerously.
Once I saw some children hunting a cat to death.
The death of a friend.
When I saw a scene on T.V where a castration was shown.

When I saw that I had passed the university entrance exam.  It á
made me forget all my problems.

When I was ten I got shut in the school with a friend.  I had to á
jump out of a window and cross a beam 10 metres high.

When I was told that a boy did not want to be my friend without á
any apparent reason.

When I learnt that a boy I liked had been with a girl for three á
years.

When a very dirty class-mate farted in my  presence.  There was a á
terrible smell.

When I saw my 16 year old sister at home after having waited for á
her all night, not knowing where she was.

While I was waiting for them to give me the marks of the most á
difficult subject this year.

I had an argument with my mother because I criticized the rules á
she imposes at home, which are too rigid and arbitrary for me.

When I learned that a friend of mine had not been speaking to her á
boyfriend for a week after an argument because of unfounded á
jealousy.
On seeing a scene of an accident in a magazine.

After several days delay in my girlfriend's menstration I was á
very glad to see that the pregnancy test was negative.

When I saw a TV program on the North American military plan á
called "The startwar".

I felt angry when I saw on T.V the last slaughter of negroes in á
South Africa.
When I saw the pictures of the draught in Etiopia.
Whenever I see an alcoholic.

The day the Real Madrid team of basket ball qualified for the á
final at Athens.

The last time I was face to face with with the monstrous dog á
which lives in my street.

During a trivial (friendly) discussion, one of the participants á
made an intervention which made me feel uncomfortable.

When I heard the last regulation of the socialist govrenment á
concerning pensions.
When I got to know the details if the famine in East Africa.
When I passed an important exam.

In a rather important exam, when they caught me red handed á
copying.

When my father addressed me directly and maliciously, thus á
including me in the "family war".
When my parents got divorced.

When I was a child, one day while playing, I fell up to my waist á
in mud.
When I passed an exam which I had failed last year.
When I go out alone at night.
A murder.
When I failed two subjects last year.
When I see people who have no sentiments.

When I was told that I could take a week off and go for a trip á
with my friends.
Every time I went home with my school report.

During an argument between friends, one of them accused me of á
taking advantage of some other friends who usually come to the á
university in my car, saying that I ask them too much money for á
the petrol.
When I learned that two of my friends had had a serious car accident.
A young man was insulting and humiliating a drunken man.

When I saw that I had passed an exam.  It was the last chance and á
there was a lot at stake.

On a trip to Santander we wanted to stop at a curve because a á
friend was sick, and the car skidded of the gravel.

My cousins were playing at home and one of them broke a decorative á
object which was very precious to me.

All my friends arranged to go for an afternoon snack and they did á
not tell me.  They told me that they did not have my phone number á
but I do not think that this was true.

When I saw a film where a black was rapeing a girl while another one was á
filming it for a pornographic movie.

When I pass exams, or when a close friend of mine recovered á
from an illness,etc.

Fights that I see in the middle of the street, robberies, fear of á
darkness when going home.

During a family discussion on my future and my prospects as a á
student, they accused me of not bothering about looking for a job to á
assume my financial situation.
[ Depressions.]

Some people whom I do not like at all, and one of the reasons is á
their physical appearance.

When I met a very close friend of mine after one year of á
separation.

There was an earthquake for several minutes and I was on the á
eight floor.

An argument among several friends because of the irrational á
behavior of one of them who fell out with us for no reason and á
said that we were to blame.

A class-mate died after being two months in coma, after a car á
accident.
Pictures of Nazi extermination camps on a T.V program.
When my sister was born.
When they tried to rob me.
When I failed an exam unfairly.
When my grandmother died.
When I see dead dogs on the road.
When my little sister was born.

When I was attending an authorized demonstrationand the police á
rushed brutally at the demonstrators, without any warning.

When a professor of this faculty laughed at, and was suspicious of á
a composition written by a class-mate and me.
The death of a relative, friend, or someone I esteem.
